summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2066, for the improvement of 3rd Avenue, from Pine Street to Virginia Street, all in the City of Seattle, by installation of a system of cluster lights along the curb line of each side of said avenue, together with the installation of such poles, conduits and wiring as may be necessary for the proper installation of said equipment of said system; under Ordinance No. 20765 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
